name: Division of Marketing & Communications
description:
Texas A&M’s Division of Marketing & Communications is dedicated to telling the Texas A&M story and managing the Texas A&M brand through strategic internal and external communications and the development of well integrated marketing and business development campaigns and strategies.

Our division includes three areas: marketing, communications and business development, all of which are committed to enhancing the national visibility and reputation of Texas A&M.
